ability.Precision Strike: This Pokemon's moves ignore accuracy checks.
ability.Frost Armor: When HP is below half, this Pokemon's Defense is 1.5x.

Ice Fang.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

Saber Slash.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Roar of Dominance.effect: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

Frozen Roar.effect: Freezes the target. If the target is already frozen, raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.
